title: Minecraft 携带版 Alpha 0.12.1 build4 已发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2015-8-5 10:07 编辑 


https://docs.google.com/document/d/11tUgbssVOAwT0xD1_sB_CJV3Ugl4hZSdVDBbFwayxXA/pub 需翻墙
Tweaks


All quartz blocks can now be placed directionally.
Trying to connect to old versions of the game will now show an error message.
Added recipes for golden and enchanted golden apples.
Added enchanted books to the creative inventory.
Stone cutter and crafting table screens will now close if blocks are destroyed while they are open.
Improved controls

Bug Fixes


Fixed crash when entering the nether repeatedly.
Fixed farmland not being destroyed when jumping on it in multiplayer.
Pressing the inventory button not close multiple inventory screens.
Fixed crafting recipes being wrong multiplayer.
Fixed partial blocks working properly in multiplayer.
Fixed disconnected controller action repeating.
Fixed drinking potions in creative mode.
Fixed bane of arthropods dealing additional damage to spiders.
Fixed furnace displaying blocks that were not in your inventory.
Fixed dark sky color in flat worlds.



修改
-所有的石英方块现在可以被定向放置
-尝试与旧版本的游戏连接现在会显示错误信息
-添加金苹果和附魔金苹果的合成配方
-在创造模式物品中添加附魔书
-切石机和工作台屏幕会在玩家使用时且突然被破坏后关闭
-改进操作bug修复
-修复了反复进入地狱的崩溃
-修复了在多人游戏中，玩家在耕地上跳不会踩坏耕地的问题
-点击物品栏按钮不关闭多个物品栏屏幕
-修复了多人游戏中合成配方的错误
-修复了某些方块，使其能够在多人游戏中正常使用
-修复手柄未连接一直反复提示
-修复了创造模式中喝药水的问题
-修复了“节肢杀手”属性计算赋予蜘蛛额外伤害的问题
-修复熔炉显示不在玩家身上的物品的问题
-修复超平坦世界的黑色天空
由于build4 bug过多，玩家不能跳跃或者破坏方块，不推荐更新。
